channel.title: Troll box change
channel.description:
Right now, immediately after you troll box someone, if they are vigilant, they will yell "TROLL BOX" and foil your master plan. For this reason, I suggest some changes:
**Silence players after troll boxing them** Same effect as assassin's distract; they can't speak for 10 seconds. A smart troll box get's someone on trial in less than that time. If this is OP, you can either make it less than 10 seconds of silence (5 maybe) or place a cooldown on this special troll box.
**Scorned special troll box: secret troll box** This one is simple enough: The player you troll box will not see the message you made them send in the chat history (this troll box will not silence players like I suggested in suggestion 1). This makes it take much more time for people to spot the phantom troll box hiding somewhere, causing it to be much more effective. Used during a trial, it can cause someone's death.
The scorned would have 2 normal troll boxes and 1 secret troll box.
